(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT The) (NN sign))
      (PP (IN in)
        (NP
          (NP (NN front))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP (DT this) (NN shop))))))
    (VP (VBZ proclaims)
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (PRP you))
          (VP (MD should)
            (VP (VB call)
              (PRT (RP up))
              (S
                (VP (TO to)
                  (VP (VB reserve)
                    (NP (PRP$ your) (NNP Bak) (NNP Chang))
                    (SBAR (IN if)
                      (S
                        (NP (PRP you))
                        (VP (VBP want)
                          (S
                            (VP (TO to)
                              (VP (VB avoid)
                                (NP (NN dissappointment))))))))))))))))
    (. !)))

nsubj(proclaims-8, sign-2)
prep(sign-2, in-3)
pobj(in-3, front-4)
prep(front-4, of-5)
det(shop-7, this-6)
pobj(of-5, shop-7)
root(ROOT-0, proclaims-8)
mark(call-12, that-9)
nsubj(call-12, you-10)
aux(call-12, should-11)
ccomp(proclaims-8, call-12)
prt(call-12, up-13)
aux(reserve-15, to-14)
xcomp(call-12, reserve-15)
poss(Chang-18, your-16)
nn(Chang-18, Bak-17)
dobj(reserve-15, Chang-18)

nsubj(want-21, you-20)
advcl(reserve-15, want-21)
aux(avoid-23, to-22)
xcomp(want-21, avoid-23)
dobj(avoid-23, dissappointment-24)

  (S (IN So)
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (ADJP (RB quite) (JJ full))
      (SBAR
        (WHADVP (WRB when))
        (S
          (NP (PRP I))
          (VP (VBD got)
            (NP (NN home))))))
    (. .)))


dep(full-5, So-1)
nsubj(full-5, I-2)
cop(full-5, was-3)
advmod(full-5, quite-4)
root(ROOT-0, full-5)
advmod(got-8, when-6)
nsubj(got-8, I-7)
advcl(full-5, got-8)
dobj(got-8, home-9)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP
      (VP (VBD opened)
        (NP (CD one))
        (PP (IN for)
          (NP (NNS ieatprincess)))
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB try)))))
      (CC and)
      (VP (VBD ended)
        (PRT (RP up))
        (S
          (VP
            (VP (VBG opening)
              (PRT (RP up))
              (ADVP (RB all)
                (NP (CD three))))
            (CC and)
            (VP (VBG eating)
              (NP
                (NP
                  (QP (RB almost) (PDT half)))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP (DT each)))))))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(opened-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, opened-2)
dobj(opened-2, one-3)
prep(opened-2, for-4)
pobj(for-4, ieatprincess-5)
aux(try-7, to-6)
xcomp(opened-2, try-7)
cc(opened-2, and-8)
conj(opened-2, ended-9)
prt(ended-9, up-10)
ccomp(ended-9, opening-11)
prt(opening-11, up-12)
advmod(opening-11, all-13)
pobj(all-13, three-14)
cc(opening-11, and-15)
conj(opening-11, eating-16)
quantmod(half-18, almost-17)
dobj(eating-16, half-18)
prep(half-18, of-19)
pobj(of-19, each-20)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT That))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (SBAR
        (WHADJP (WRB how) (JJ good))
        (S
          (NP (PRP it))
          (VP (VBD was)))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(was-2, That-1)
root(ROOT-0, was-2)
advmod(good-4, how-3)
dep(was-6, good-4)
nsubj(was-6, it-5)
ccomp(was-2, was-6)


(ROOT
  (NP (NNP Best) (NNP Bak) (NNP Chang)))


nn(Chang-3, Best-1)
nn(Chang-3, Bak-2)
root(ROOT-0, Chang-3)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP have)
      (ADVP (RB ever))
      (VP (VBN eaten)))
    (. !)))


nsubj(eaten-4, I-1)
aux(eaten-4, have-2)
advmod(eaten-4, ever-3)
root(ROOT-0, eaten-4)
